summary: Completed comprehensive SEO/LLMO testing for sumansourabh.com React portfolio. Verified semantic HTML, JSON-LD schemas, meta tags, heading hierarchy, robots.txt/sitemap.xml accessibility, outcome-focused alt text, lazy loading, and visual design integrity.

design_issues.description: Page has 2 meta description elements - one from index.html and one from SeoHead.jsx component
design_issues.impact: Minor SEO impact - search engines will use the first one

passed_tests: H1 tag verification: Single H1 with 'SaaS Product Strategist' text found
Semantic HTML: header[role='banner'] for hero section implemented
Semantic HTML: article elements for case studies in MessyMiddle section (10 found)
Semantic HTML: pricing section with id='pricing' and aria-labelledby='pricing-heading'
JSON-LD schemas: All 4 required schemas present (Person, ProfessionalService, ItemList, FAQPage)
Meta tags: Description contains both 'SaaS Product Strategist' and 'churn'
Open Graph tags: All 6 required OG tags present with proper content
Twitter Card tags: All 4 required Twitter Card tags present
Image alt text: All 9 images have alt text, 8 are outcome-focused (not just visual descriptions)
Lazy loading: 8 out of 9 images have lazy loading attribute applied
Heading hierarchy: Proper heading structure with single H1 and appropriate H2/H3 cascade
robots.txt accessibility: Returns 200 status and allows all crawlers
sitemap.xml accessibility: Returns 200 status and contains all expected routes
Pricing section accessibility: Proper id and aria-labelledby attributes
FAQ section accessibility: Proper heading ID for navigation
Button interactivity: Strategy call buttons are clickable and functional
Visual design integrity: All sections load properly, no console errors
Page performance: No error messages or broken functionality detected
action_item_for_main_agent: Consider removing duplicate meta description from index.html since SeoHead.jsx component is already providing the meta description dynamically
